item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United monitor Bournemouth duo Adams, Scott
item.description: Manchester United drew 4-4 with Bournemouth on Monday but are scouting two of their midfielders: Alex Scott and Tyler Adams. Transfer Talk has the lat...

item.title: Flagg youngest ever to score 40 as Mavs fall in OT
item.description: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg became the youngest player in NBA history to score 40 points after he dropped 42 in an overtime loss Monday.

item.title: Rockets' Udoka lashes out at refs after OT loss
item.description: Rockets coach Ime Udoka was critical of the officiating after his team's OT loss to the Nuggets, calling out the crew for inconsistent calls.

item.title: Chiefs' Mahomes has surgery for torn ACL, LCL
item.description: Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes underwent successful surgery Monday in Dallas to repair the tear in his left ACL. A league source told ESPN that Ma...

item.title: Rodgers says win made extra special by 'castoffs'
item.description: Aaron Rodgers grinned as he shouted out the names of his teammates who helped the Steelers beat the Dolphins on Monday night -- Kenneth Gainwell, Conn...
